mapper.select: SELECT f.field_seq AS fieldSeq, field_name AS fieldName, field_img AS fieldImg, field_address AS fieldAddress, field_address_detail AS fieldAddressDetail, shower_room AS showerRoom, rent_ball AS rentBall, rent_shoes AS rentShoes, parking, sell_drink AS sellDrink FROM fields f, field_imgs fi WHERE f.field_seq = fi.field_seq;
